mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM ( SELECT ol.object_id AS doc_id, MAX(ol.created_at) AS last_edit_at FROM t_operation_log ol WHERE ol.operation_type = 2 AND ol.kb_id = #{kbId} GROUP BY ol.object_id ) le JOIN t_knowledge_document d ON d.id = le.doc_id WHERE d.kb_id = #{kbId} AND d.del_status = 0 AND d.doc_status = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_operation_log ol2 WHERE ol2.object_id = d.id AND ol2.kb_id = #{kbId} AND ol2.operation_type = 5 AND ol2.created_at >= le.last_edit_at ) ORDER BY le.last_edit_at DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
